original_text: “As for these things that you see, the days will come when there will not be left here one stone upon another that will not be thrown down.”
korean_text: 너희 보는 이것들이 날이 이르면 돌 하나도 돌 위에 남지 않고 다 무너뜨려지리라

sentences.original_text: As for these things that you see,
when there will not be left here one stone upon another
sentences.korean_translation: 여기 돌 위에 돌 하나도 남지 않아

sentences.original_text: that will not be thrown down.
